001package io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.components.checkbox;
002
003import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.selenium.smart.SmartWebElement;
004import io.cyborgcode.roa.ui.util.strategy.Strategy;
005import java.util.List;
006import org.openqa.selenium.By;
007
008/**
009 * Defines operations for interacting with checkbox components.
010 *
011 * <p>This interface provides methods to select or deselect checkboxes,
012 * verify their selected and enabled states, and retrieve checkbox labels.
013 *
014 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
015 */
016public interface Checkbox {
017
018   /**
019    * Selects checkboxes with the specified text within the given container.
020    *
021    * @param container    The container holding the checkboxes.
022    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes to select.
023    */
024   void select(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
025
026   /**
027    * Selects checkboxes within the given container using a specified strategy.
028    *
029    * @param container The container holding the checkboxes.
030    * @param strategy  The strategy used for selecting checkboxes.
031    * @return A string representing the selected checkbox label if applicable.
032    */
033   String select(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
034
035   /**
036    * Selects checkboxes identified by the given text at the top level.
037    *
038    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes to select.
039    */
040   void select(String... checkBoxText);
041
042   /**
043    * Selects checkboxes located by the specified locator.
044    *
045    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
046    */
047   void select(By... checkBoxLocator);
048
049   /**
050    * Deselects checkboxes with the specified text within the given container.
051    *
052    * @param container    The container holding the checkboxes.
053    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes to deselect.
054    */
055   void deSelect(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
056
057   /**
058    * Deselects checkboxes within the given container using a specified strategy.
059    *
060    * @param container The container holding the checkboxes.
061    * @param strategy  The strategy used for deselecting checkboxes.
062    * @return A string representing the deselected checkbox label if applicable.
063    */
064   String deSelect(SmartWebElement container, Strategy strategy);
065
066   /**
067    * Deselects checkboxes identified by the given text at the top level.
068    *
069    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes to deselect.
070    */
071   void deSelect(String... checkBoxText);
072
073   /**
074    * Deselects checkboxes located by the specified locator.
075    *
076    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
077    */
078   void deSelect(By... checkBoxLocator);
079
080   /**
081    * Checks if checkboxes with the specified text within the given container are selected.
082    *
083    * @param container    The container holding the checkboxes.
084    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes.
085    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected; false otherwise.
086    */
087   boolean areSelected(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
088
089   /**
090    * Checks if checkboxes identified by the given text at the top level are selected.
091    *
092    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes.
093    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected; false otherwise.
094    */
095   boolean areSelected(String... checkBoxText);
096
097   /**
098    * Checks if checkboxes located by the specified locator are selected.
099    *
100    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
101    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are selected; false otherwise.
102    */
103   boolean areSelected(By... checkBoxLocator);
104
105   /**
106    * Checks if checkboxes with the specified text within the given container are enabled.
107    *
108    * @param container    The container holding the checkboxes.
109    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes.
110    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled; false otherwise.
111    */
112   boolean areEnabled(SmartWebElement container, String... checkBoxText);
113
114   /**
115    * Checks if checkboxes identified by the given text at the top level are enabled.
116    *
117    * @param checkBoxText The text identifiers for the checkboxes.
118    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled; false otherwise.
119    */
120   boolean areEnabled(String... checkBoxText);
121
122   /**
123    * Checks if checkboxes located by the specified locator are enabled.
124    *
125    * @param checkBoxLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
126    * @return true if all specified checkboxes are enabled; false otherwise.
127    */
128   boolean areEnabled(By... checkBoxLocator);
129
130   /**
131    * Retrieves a list of labels for all selected checkboxes within the given container.
132    *
133    * @param container The container holding the checkboxes.
134    * @return A list of selected checkbox labels.
135    */
136   List<String> getSelected(SmartWebElement container);
137
138   /**
139    * Retrieves a list of labels for all selected checkboxes located by the specified locator.
140    *
141    * @param containerLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
142    * @return A list of selected checkbox labels.
143    */
144   List<String> getSelected(By containerLocator);
145
146   /**
147    * Retrieves a list of labels for all checkboxes within the given container.
148    *
149    * @param container The container holding the checkboxes.
150    * @return A list of all checkbox labels.
151    */
152   List<String> getAll(SmartWebElement container);
153
154   /**
155    * Retrieves a list of labels for all checkboxes located by the specified locator.
156    *
157    * @param containerLocator The locator identifying the checkboxes.
158    * @return A list of all checkbox labels.
159    */
160   List<String> getAll(By containerLocator);
161
162}
